data.title: RAAA Database Services
data.text:
ANNOUNCEMENTS

Effective July 1, 2024 the Total Herd Reporting fee has increased to $28 annually per active cow (16 months or older). Voted on by RAAA Board of Directors in May 2024.

Annual Membership Dues & Spring THR Billing to Occur July 12 - RAAAâ€™s fiscal year begins on July 1, and with that comes the billing of membership dues and the first installment of your active-status, spring-calving females for Total Herd Reporting. The Regular membership fee is $125, a Junior membership is $25, and an Associate membership is $30 - all are billed annually in July. A mailed and emailed notice of billing will be sent to you on August 1. To view the billing details login to your REDSPro account > My Account > billing details. If you wish to cancel your membership, please send a written response with your account number via email to Halla@redangus.org , or by letter to 18335 E 103rd Ave Suite 202 Commerce City, CO 80022.

RAAA Summer Office Hours are 8-4 MST from May 15 - August 15

Due to the recent change in our database IP address, any previous links to the Red Angus database (REDSpro) are no longer valid. This includes hyperlinks to animals' profiles. Any link to the Red Angus database will need to be updated to be usable (i.e. websites with links to animal profiles).

Next Reporting Deadline:

Fall 2024 Herd Inventory Due September 4

Other Dates:

August 1: Statements Mailed

August 7: Fall 2023 No Progeny Requested

August 9: Spring THR - 2nd Installment Billed

August 14: Spring 2024 Birth/Weaning (Calf Data) Requested

August 21: Spring Heifer Exposure Requested

September 1: RASF Golf Tournament Fundraiser Sign Up Deadline

See full THR calendar: Click Here

National Red Angus Convention registration now open!

The inaugural Red Angus Stakeholders Foundation golf tournament fundraiser will be held Tuesday September 10th. Deadline for golf tournament sign up is September 1st; sign up TODAY!

Sign up here

Schedule a personalized one-on-one meeting with registration staff to go over your account, learn REDSPro tips and tricks, get help with submitting your calf data or updating your herd inventory and MORE! This resource is for members of all ages, regions and herd sizes. Meetings can be scheduled via Zoom, Google Meet or a phone call. Schedule HERE!

BOLT EPDs

To guarantee inclusion in the weekly BOLT evaluation, data must be Final Submitted by Sunday. Results are available 9 days later on the following Tuesday. Data is only pulled once a week, and is only updated once a week. See the calendar below for an example.
